ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgacl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_subrgsubg | |- ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) -> A e. ( SubGrp ` R ) ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_subgcl | |- ( ( A e. ( SubGrp ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. A ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( A e. ( SubRing ` R ) /\ X e. A /\ Y e. A ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. A ) |
